title: EdiFlow: Data-intensive interactive workflows for visual analytics.
abstract: Visual analytics aims at combining interactive data visualization with data analysis tasks. Given the explosion in volume and complexity of scientific data, e.g., associated to biological or physical processes or social networks, visual analytics is called to play an important role in scientific data management.
departments: French Institute for Research in Computer Science and Automation
